sqlMap.select: SELECT ERR_MSG ,ERR_FLAG ,DATA_TYPE ,PID ,USE_COMPANY_CD ,USE_ORG_CD ,REQ_COMPANY_CD ,REQ_ORG_CD ,HPMS_ID ,CUSTOMER_CD ,INVEST_TYPE_CD ,ITEM_NAME ,APPLICATION ,UNIT ,UPLOAD_FILE_NAME FROM ( SELECT '0' FLAG ,'ERR_MSG' ERR_MSG ,'ERR_FLAG' ERR_FLAG ,'DATA_TYPE' DATA_TYPE ,'PID' PID ,'USE_COMPANY_CD' USE_COMPANY_CD ,'USE_ORG_CD' USE_ORG_CD ,'REQ_COMPANY_CD' REQ_COMPANY_CD ,'REQ_ORG_CD' REQ_ORG_CD ,'HPMS_ID' HPMS_ID ,'CUSTOMER_CD' CUSTOMER_CD ,'INVEST_TYPE_CD' INVEST_TYPE_CD ,'ITEM_NAME' ITEM_NAME ,'APPLICATION' APPLICATION ,'UNIT' UNIT ,'UPLOAD_FILE_NAME' UPLOAD_FILE_NAME FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT '1' FLAG , ERR_MSG ,TO_CHAR(ERR_FLAG) ERR_FLAG ,DATA_TYPE ,PID ,USE_COMPANY_CD ,USE_ORG_CD ,REQ_COMPANY_CD ,REQ_ORG_CD ,HPMS_ID ,CUSTOMER_CD ,INVEST_TYPE_CD ,ITEM_NAME ,APPLICATION ,UNIT ,UPLOAD_FILE_NAME FROM HP2D001W WHERE LOG_SEQ =#LOG_SEQ# AND ERR_FLAG=1 ) ORDER BY FLAG, ERR_MSG, ERR_FLAG, DATA_TYPE, PID, USE_COMPANY_CD, USE_ORG_CD, REQ_COMPANY_CD, REQ_ORG_CD
SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24.mi.ss') AS CDATE FROM DUAL
SELECT ( COMPANY_CD || ORG_CD ) AS ITEM_CD ,ORG_NM_S ITEM_NM FROM HP1DM03T WHERE ORG_LVL =2 AND ACTIVE_FLAG='0' ORDER BY ORG_SEQ

SELECT C.DATA_TYPE ITEM_CD, C.DATA_TYPE || (SELECT '(' || B.DATA_TYPE_NM || ')' AS DATA_TYPE_NM FROM HP1AU03T A, HP1D003T B WHERE B.PID = #PID# AND B.DATA_TYPE = C.DATA_TYPE AND A.DATA_TYPE = B.DATA_TYPE AND A.AUTH_CD = C.AUTH_CD AND A.CD_TYPE = 'DTYPE') AS ITEM_NM FROM HP1AU03T C WHERE AUTH_CD = #AUTH_CD# AND CD_TYPE = 'DTYPE'

SELECT DISTINCT HP1DM04T.HPMS_GRP_ID as ITEM_CD, HP1DM04T.HPMS_GRP_ID||':'||HP1M105T.VAL1 AS ITEM_NM FROM HP1DM04T, HP1M105T WHERE HP1DM04T.HPMS_GRP_ID = HP1M105T.CD AND HP1M105T.CD_TYPE='HPMS_GRP_ID'
select LOG_SEQ.nextval LOG_SEQ , #LOG_CODE# AS LOG_CODE FROM DUAL
sqlMap.insert: Insert into HP_DBA01.HP2D001W (LOG_SEQ, CUSTOMER_CD, UNIT, USER_ID, ERR_MSG, PID, APPLICATION, HPMS_ID, UPDATE_TIME, ERR_FLAG, INVEST_TYPE_CD, VAL, PROCESSING_FLAG, YYYYMM, ITEM_NAME, REQ_ORG_CD, REQ_COMPANY_CD, USE_ORG_CD, DATA_TYPE, UPLOAD_FILE_NAME, USE_COMPANY_CD) values(#LOG_SEQ# , #CUSTOMER_CD# , #UNIT# , #USER_ID# , #ERR_MSG# , #PID# , #APPLICATION# , #HPMS_ID# , #UPDATE_TIME# , #ERR_FLAG# , #INVEST_TYPE_CD# , #VAL# , #PROCESSING_FLAG# , #YYYYMM# , #ITEM_NAME# , #REQ_ORG_CD# , #REQ_COMPANY_CD# , #USE_ORG_CD# , #DATA_TYPE# , #UPLOAD_FILE_NAME# , #USE_COMPANY_CD# )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT Z.PID_ERROR, Z.PID, Z.DATA_TYPE_ERROR, Z.DATA_TYPE, Z.USE_COMPANY_CD_ERROR, Z.USE_COMPANY_CD, Z.REQ_COMPANY_CD_ERROR, Z.REQ_COMPANY_CD, Z.HPMS_ID_ERROR, Z.HPMS_ID, Z.INVEST_TYPE_CD_ERROR, Z.INVEST_TYPE_CD, Z.ITEM_NAME_ERROR, Z.ITEM_NAME, Z.CUSTOMER_CD_ERROR, Z.CUSTOMER_CD, Z.DATA_TYPE_ERROR_1, Z.UNIT_ERROR, Z.UNIT, Z.USE_ORG_CD, Z.REQ_ORG_CD, Z.LOG_SEQ, Z.PROCESSING_FLAG, Z.APPLICATION, DECODE(Z.AUTH_ERROR,'','',Z.AUTH_ERROR) AS AUTH_ERROR
FROM
(
SELECT DECODE(X.PID_CNT,0,'PID Not Found','') AS PID_ERROR, X.PID, DECODE(X.DATA_TYPE_CNT,0,'DataType Error(NotFound)','') AS DATA_TYPE_ERROR, X.DATA_TYPE, DECODE(X.USE_COMPANY_CD_CNT,0,'USE_COMPANY/ORG Not Found.','') AS USE_COMPANY_CD_ERROR, X.USE_COMPANY_CD, DECODE(X.REQ_COMPANY_CD_CNT,0,'REQ_COMPANY/ORG Not Found.','') AS REQ_COMPANY_CD_ERROR, X.REQ_COMPANY_CD, DECODE(X.HPMS_ID_CNT,0,'HPMS_ID Not Found',1,'') AS HPMS_ID_ERROR, X.HPMS_ID, DECODE(X.INVEST_TYPE_CD_CNT,0,'Investment code Not Found.','') AS INVEST_TYPE_CD_ERROR, X.INVEST_TYPE_CD, DECODE(X.ITEM_NAME_CNT,0,'Item code Not Found.','') AS ITEM_NAME_ERROR, X.ITEM_NAME, DECODE(X.CUSTOMER_CD_CNT,0,'Customer Code Not Found.','') AS CUSTOMER_CD_ERROR, X.CUSTOMER_CD, DECODE(X.DATA_TYPE_CNT2,0,'DATA TYPE(AUTH) Not Found.','') AS DATA_TYPE_ERROR_1, DECODE(X.UNIT_CNT,0,'UNIT code Not Found.','') AS UNIT_ERROR, X.UNIT, X.USE_ORG_CD, X.REQ_ORG_CD, X.LOG_SEQ, X.PROCESSING_FLAG, X.APPLICATION, DECODE( DECODE( X.EXCEL_OURG_SEQ,'ALL','1', (SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM( (SELECT SUBSTR(D.ORG_SEQ, 0,8)||'00' AS ORG_LVL_4 FROM US0M001T_V01 S, HP1DM03T D WHERE S.USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND S.COMPANY_INFO_CODE = D.COMPANY_CD AND S.OFFICE_CODE = D.ORG_CD ) ) Y WHERE X.EXCEL_OURG_SEQ = Y.ORG_LVL_4) ) ,0,'UD Check authority','') AS AUTH_ERROR
FROM ( SELECT (( SELECT COUNT (A1.PID) FROM HP1DM01T A1 WHERE A1.PID = A.PID ) + (SELECT COUNT (*) PID_CNT FROM HP1M105T WHERE CD_TYPE = 'NO_PID'AND CD = A.PID) ) AS PID_CNT, A.PID, (SELECT COUNT (*) CNT FROM HP1DM06T A1 WHERE A1.DATA_TYPE = A.DATA_TYPE) AS DATA_TYPE_CNT, A.DATA_TYPE, (SELECT COUNT (*) USE_COMPANY_CNT FROM HP1DM03T A1 WHERE A1.COMPANY_CD = A.USE_COMPANY_CD AND A1.ORG_CD = A.USE_ORG_CD) AS USE_COMPANY_CD_CNT, A.USE_COMPANY_CD, (SELECT COUNT (*) USE_COMPANY_CNT FROM HP1DM03T A1 WHERE A1.COMPANY_CD = A.REQ_COMPANY_CD AND A1.ORG_CD = A.REQ_ORG_CD) AS REQ_COMPANY_CD_CNT, A.REQ_COMPANY_CD, (SELECT COUNT (*) HPMS_ID_CNT FROM HP1DM04T A1 WHERE A1.HPMS_ID = A.HPMS_ID) AS HPMS_ID_CNT, A.HPMS_ID, DECODE(A.INVEST_TYPE_CD,'##',1,(SELECT COUNT (*) INVEST_TYPE_CNT FROM HP1DM07T A1 WHERE A1.INVEST_TYPE_CD = A.INVEST_TYPE_CD)) AS INVEST_TYPE_CD_CNT, A.INVEST_TYPE_CD, DECODE(A.ITEM_NAME ,'##',1,(SELECT COUNT (*) CNT FROM HP1DM10T A1 WHERE A1.ITEM_NAME = A.ITEM_NAME)) AS ITEM_NAME_CNT, A.ITEM_NAME, DECODE(A.CUSTOMER_CD,'##',1,(SELECT COUNT (*) CUSTOMER_CNT FROM HP1DM20T A1 WHERE A1.CUSTOMER_CD = A.CUSTOMER_CD)) AS CUSTOMER_CD_CNT, A.CUSTOMER_CD, (SELECT COUNT (*) FCST_CNT FROM HP1AU03T A1 WHERE A1.AUTH_CD = A.AUTH_CD AND A1.DATA_TYPE = A.DATA_TYPE AND CD_TYPE='DTYPE') AS DATA_TYPE_CNT2, DECODE( A.UNIT ,'',1, (SELECT COUNT (*) CNT FROM HP1DM30T A1 WHERE A1.CURRENCY_CD = A.UNIT) ) AS UNIT_CNT, A.UNIT, A.REQ_ORG_CD, A.USE_ORG_CD, A.LOG_SEQ, A.PROCESSING_FLAG, A.APPLICATION, CASE A.PROCESSING_FLAG WHEN 'I' THEN 'ALL' ELSE DECODE(A.AUTH_CD,'50',(SELECT SUBSTR (C.ORG_SEQ, 0, 8) || '00' AS ORG_LVL_4 FROM HP1DM03T C WHERE C.COMPANY_CD || C.ORG_CD = A.USE_COMPANY_CD || A.USE_ORG_CD ) ,'ALL') END EXCEL_OURG_SEQ FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT PID, DATA_TYPE, USE_COMPANY_CD, USE_ORG_CD, REQ_COMPANY_CD, REQ_ORG_CD, HPMS_ID, INVEST_TYPE_CD, ITEM_NAME, CUSTOMER_CD, UNIT, #AUTH_CD# AS AUTH_CD, LOG_SEQ, PROCESSING_FLAG, APPLICATION FROM HP2D001W WHERE LOG_SEQ = #LOG_SEQ# ) A ) X )Z WHERE Z.PID_ERROR IS NOT NULL OR Z.DATA_TYPE_ERROR IS NOT NULL OR Z.USE_COMPANY_CD_ERROR IS NOT NULL OR Z.REQ_COMPANY_CD_ERROR IS NOT NULL OR Z.HPMS_ID_ERROR IS NOT NULL OR Z.INVEST_TYPE_CD_ERROR IS NOT NULL OR Z.ITEM_NAME_ERROR IS NOT NULL OR Z.CUSTOMER_CD_ERROR IS NOT NULL OR Z.UNIT_ERROR IS NOT NULL OR AUTH_ERROR IS NOT NULL OR Z.DATA_TYPE_ERROR_1 IS NOT NULL
sqlMap.update: Update HP_DBA01.HP2D001W set ERR_MSG=#ERR_MSG# , ERR_FLAG=#ERR_FLAG# where LOG_SEQ=#LOG_SEQ# and CUSTOMER_CD=#CUSTOMER_CD# and USER_ID=#USER_ID# and PID=#PID# and APPLICATION=#APPLICATION# and HPMS_ID=#HPMS_ID# and INVEST_TYPE_CD=#INVEST_TYPE_CD# and PROCESSING_FLAG=#PROCESSING_FLAG# and ITEM_NAME=#ITEM_NAME# and REQ_ORG_CD=#REQ_ORG_CD# and REQ_COMPANY_CD=#REQ_COMPANY_CD# and USE_ORG_CD=#USE_ORG_CD# and DATA_TYPE=#DATA_TYPE# and USE_COMPANY_CD=#USE_COMPANY_CD#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM HP2D001W WHERE LOG_SEQ = #LOG_SEQ# AND ERR_FLAG =1

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM HP2D001W A, HP2D001T B WHERE A.LOG_SEQ = #LOG_SEQ# AND A.DATA_TYPE =B.DATA_TYPE AND A.PID =B.PID AND A.USE_COMPANY_CD =B.USE_COMPANY_CD AND A.USE_ORG_CD =B.USE_ORG_CD AND A.REQ_COMPANY_CD =B.REQ_COMPANY_CD AND A.REQ_ORG_CD =B.REQ_ORG_CD AND A.HPMS_ID =B.HPMS_ID AND A.INVEST_TYPE_CD =B.INVEST_TYPE_CD AND A.APPLICATION =B.APPLICATION AND A.ITEM_NAME =B.ITEM_NAME AND A.CUSTOMER_CD =B.CUSTOMER_CD AND A.YYYYMM =B.YYYYMM AND A.PROCESSING_FLAG = 'I'
sqlMap.update: MERGE INTO HP2D001W X USING ( SELECT A.USER_ID, #ERR_FLAG# AS ERR_FLAG , #ERR_MSG# AS ERR_MSG, A.PROCESSING_FLAG, A.DATA_TYPE, A.PID, A.USE_COMPANY_CD, A.USE_ORG_CD, A.REQ_COMPANY_CD, A.REQ_ORG_CD, A.HPMS_ID, A.INVEST_TYPE_CD, A.APPLICATION, A.ITEM_NAME, A.CUSTOMER_CD , A.YYYYMM FROM HP2D001W A, HP2D001T B WHERE A.LOG_SEQ = #LOG_SEQ# AND A.DATA_TYPE = B.DATA_TYPE AND A.PID = B.PID AND A.USE_COMPANY_CD = B.USE_COMPANY_CD AND A.USE_ORG_CD = B.USE_ORG_CD AND A.REQ_COMPANY_CD = B.REQ_COMPANY_CD AND A.REQ_ORG_CD = B.REQ_ORG_CD AND A.HPMS_ID = B.HPMS_ID AND A.INVEST_TYPE_CD = B.INVEST_TYPE_CD AND A.APPLICATION = B.APPLICATION AND A.ITEM_NAME = B.ITEM_NAME AND A.CUSTOMER_CD = B.CUSTOMER_CD AND A.YYYYMM = B.YYYYMM AND A.PROCESSING_FLAG='I' ) Y ON ( X.DATA_TYPE = Y.DATA_TYPE AND X.PID = Y.PID AND X.USE_COMPANY_CD = Y.USE_COMPANY_CD AND X.USE_ORG_CD = Y.USE_ORG_CD AND X.REQ_COMPANY_CD = Y.REQ_COMPANY_CD AND X.REQ_ORG_CD = Y.REQ_ORG_CD AND X.HPMS_ID = Y.HPMS_ID AND X.INVEST_TYPE_CD = Y.INVEST_TYPE_CD AND X.APPLICATION = Y.APPLICATION AND X.ITEM_NAME = Y.ITEM_NAME AND X.CUSTOMER_CD = Y.CUSTOMER_CD AND X.YYYYMM = Y.YYYYMM ) when matched then UPDATE SET X.ERR_FLAG = Y.ERR_FLAG, X.ERR_MSG=Y.ERR_MSG

MERGE INTO HP2D001T X USING ( SELECT A.USER_ID , A.PROCESSING_FLAG, A.DATA_TYPE, A.PID, A.USE_COMPANY_CD, A.USE_ORG_CD, A.REQ_COMPANY_CD, A.REQ_ORG_CD, A.HPMS_ID, A.INVEST_TYPE_CD, A.APPLICATION, A.ITEM_NAME, A.CUSTOMER_CD , A.YYYYMM , A.VAL, A.UNIT, A.UPLOAD_FILE_NAME, A.UPDATE_TIME FROM HP2D001W A WHERE A.LOG_SEQ = #LOG_SEQ# ) Y ON ( X.DATA_TYPE = Y.DATA_TYPE AND X.PID = Y.PID AND X.USE_COMPANY_CD = Y.USE_COMPANY_CD AND X.USE_ORG_CD = Y.USE_ORG_CD AND X.REQ_COMPANY_CD = Y.REQ_COMPANY_CD AND X.REQ_ORG_CD = Y.REQ_ORG_CD AND X.HPMS_ID = Y.HPMS_ID AND X.INVEST_TYPE_CD = Y.INVEST_TYPE_CD AND X.APPLICATION = Y.APPLICATION AND X.ITEM_NAME = Y.ITEM_NAME AND X.CUSTOMER_CD = Y.CUSTOMER_CD AND X.YYYYMM = Y.YYYYMM ) when matched then UPDATE SET X.UPDATE_USER_ID = Y.USER_ID, X.VAL=Y.VAL, X.UNIT=Y.UNIT, X.UPLOAD_FILE_NAME=Y.UPLOAD_FILE_NAME, X.UPDATE_TIME =Y.UPDATE_TIME when NOT matched then INSERT ( X.UPDATE_USER_ID , X.DATA_TYPE, X.PID, X.USE_COMPANY_CD, X.USE_ORG_CD, X.REQ_COMPANY_CD, X.REQ_ORG_CD, X.HPMS_ID, X.INVEST_TYPE_CD, X.APPLICATION, X.ITEM_NAME, X.CUSTOMER_CD , X.YYYYMM , X.VAL, X.UNIT, X.UPLOAD_FILE_NAME, X.UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES ( Y.USER_ID , Y.DATA_TYPE, Y.PID, Y.USE_COMPANY_CD, Y.USE_ORG_CD, Y.REQ_COMPANY_CD, Y.REQ_ORG_CD, Y.HPMS_ID, Y.INVEST_TYPE_CD, Y.APPLICATION, Y.ITEM_NAME, Y.CUSTOMER_CD , Y.YYYYMM , Y.VAL, Y.UNIT, Y.UPLOAD_FILE_NAME, Y.UPDATE_TIME )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM HP2D001T X WHERE ( X.DATA_TYPE, X.PID, X.USE_COMPANY_CD, X.USE_ORG_CD, X.REQ_COMPANY_CD, X.REQ_ORG_CD, X.HPMS_ID, X.INVEST_TYPE_CD, X.APPLICATION, X.ITEM_NAME, X.CUSTOMER_CD ) IN (SELECT X.DATA_TYPE, X.PID, X.USE_COMPANY_CD, X.USE_ORG_CD, X.REQ_COMPANY_CD, X.REQ_ORG_CD, X.HPMS_ID, X.INVEST_TYPE_CD, X.APPLICATION, X.ITEM_NAME, X.CUSTOMER_CD FROM HP2D001W X WHERE X.LOG_SEQ = #LOG_SEQ# AND X.PROCESSING_FLAG='D')
sqlMap.insert: Insert into HP_DBA01.HP2D001W (LOG_SEQ, CUSTOMER_CD, UNIT, USER_ID, ERR_MSG, PID, APPLICATION, HPMS_ID, UPDATE_TIME, ERR_FLAG, INVEST_TYPE_CD, VAL, PROCESSING_FLAG, YYYYMM, ITEM_NAME, REQ_ORG_CD, REQ_COMPANY_CD, USE_ORG_CD, DATA_TYPE, UPLOAD_FILE_NAME, USE_COMPANY_CD) values(#LOG_SEQ# , #CUSTOMER_CD# , #UNIT# , #USER_ID# , #ERR_MSG# , #PID# , #APPLICATION# , #HPMS_ID# , #UPDATE_TIME# , #ERR_FLAG# , #INVEST_TYPE_CD# , #VAL# , #PROCESSING_FLAG# , #YYYYMM# , #ITEM_NAME# , #REQ_ORG_CD# , #REQ_COMPANY_CD# , #USE_ORG_CD# , #DATA_TYPE# , #UPLOAD_FILE_NAME# , #USE_COMPANY_CD# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT SUBSTR(ORG_SEQ, 0, ( SELECT ORG_LVL*2 FROM HP1DM03T WHERE COMPANY_CD=#COMPANY_CD# AND ORG_CD = #ORG_CD# )) ORG_SEQ FROM HP1DM03T WHERE COMPANY_CD = #COMPANY_CD# AND ORG_CD=#ORG_CD#
